questions.question_text:
A company has ten sales regions. Each salesperson is assigned to one region. You create a set of five standard views that all salespeople will use.
Sales users only want to see information for their own region. Sales users must call sales leads within a week of receiving a lead.
You need to recommend a solution for sales users.
Which two actions will you recommend? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

choices.A: Instruct users to create personal views that filter by region.
choices.B: Instruct users to filter the view by region.
choices.D: Configure the definition for each view to filter by region.
choices.C: Configure the definition for each view to sort by region.

questions.question_text:
A company uses Power Apps in a single Microsoft Dataverse environment.

Users are divided into two groups about how a canvas app should work. The company decides that each group of users will try a version of the app for one week and switch to the other version of the app the following week.

You need to manage the app creation.

What should you do?

choices.D: Create two apps with different app names.
choices.A: Create one app with two different version notes.
choices.B: Create two apps with the same name.
choices.C: Create one app with two different version numbers.
